[**FTPit.com**](https://www.ftpit.com/) is having a **Spooktacular** deal for our New York Location. For the month of October receive **45%** off select OpenVZ SSD VPS. 

**The discounted pricing will be reflected on the payment page.** No promo code necessary!

**Looking Glass**

* [New York](http://buffalo.lg.ftpit.com/)


-----

* Bandwidth: 2 TB
* RAM: 512 MB
* CPU Cores: 2
* IPv4: 1
* OpenVZ/SolusVM


[**Order Now!**](https://secure.ftpit.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=106&promocode=Spooky&billingcycle=monthly)

-----

[**Order Now!**](https://secure.ftpit.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=108&promocode=Spooky&billingcycle=monthly)

Need a KVM server instead? [**Click Here!**](https://secure.ftpit.com/cart.php?gid=25&promocode=let30offwestcoast) and use Promo Code **let30offwestcoast** for a **30%** discount on all our West Coast KVM servers.

We accept Paypal, Bitcoins, and Credit/Debit. [FTPit.com](https://www.ftpit.com/) also offers a wide range of [**Customized Web Servers**](https://www.ftpit.com/customized-dedicated-server/) and [**Dedicated Servers**](https://www.ftpit.com/dedicated-servers/). If you have any questions regarding our services, please open a ticket or use our Live Chat on [**FTPit.com**](https://www.ftpit.com/).
